name: Kontent Creator Dev Kit Basic
description:
This was a game i was making it was going to be a tycoon/buisiness sim were you control your own youtube/twitch.tv channels although i renamed those to PlayTube and Cringe.tv respectively.

This is not a completed game at all but you can take it to completion and release it if you want.

Everything included is copyright free except for the name RKSlither / PinkysSoft / ThePinkertonCompany 

Can be used for educational purposes also there is some nice code and even some nice working systems like the tooltips and so on so you can even just get it and take those out for use on other games/projects.

This is for the Unity3D/Unity5 Game Engine which can be downloaded for free.

Includes a zip file holding all the games information including the note files i use for things that have certain properties there is also a raw Unity3D package file for easy installation just click the unity3d package file

Thanks i appreciate any support and may this package at the very least teach you some things about game design and or code.
